mapper.update: update borrow_record set last_return_date=#{finish}, memo='假期自动续借' where last_return_date between #{start} and #{finish};
mapper.select: select * from borrow_record A where datediff(A.last_return_date, current_date()) < 3 and A.return_time is null and A.last_return_date >= all ( select B.last_return_date from borrow_record B where B.user_id = A.user_id and datediff(B.last_return_date, current_date()) < 3 and B.return_time is null);
